name: But the Battle Isn't Over
desc:
"Remember, the war with the monsters cannot be won by retreating."
"We are the last defense, the final iron wall between them and Belobog..."
"We cannot retreat under any circumstances!"
She looks up to see the frozen earth and endless winter ahead.
Business as usual.
Only that... the figure at which she had been gazing is gone.

ranks.desc: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by #1[i]% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered once after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action (except the wearer) deals #2[i]% more DMG for #3[i] turn(s).
